column5: Hi All,  So i'm heading up to Bass Lake tommorrow for some fishing and camping. I was just wondering if anyone have ever been here. I mean the name of the lake itself hopefully self describes the fish in the lake. It's a provincial park and fairly close to Orillia so I was wondering if there would any good fishing there?

Nice little lake, though it can be busy on weekends with jetskis etc. Not a big lake so you can explore it well in one day. Lots of panfish and bass, look for humps on the north side of the lake with weeds.  Only fished it a couple of times but did well both times with spinnerbaits.  Mike
